effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 793,324 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 304,793.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

spells.description: Equip: Increases effectiveness of Blasphemite secondary effects by 25%.

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,452, further increased by 907 while you remain within its light.
Use: Supercharge yourself and increase your Haste by 8,355 for 15 sec. The first ally you heal directly is also charged, increasing their Haste by 2,492 for 10 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.
